scripts.dev:stack: concurrently --raw "pnpm --filter @game/domain dev:watch" "PORT=4000 pnpm --filter @game/server dev:watch" "VITE_API_URL=http://localhost:4000 VITE_WS_URL=ws://localhost:4000/ws pnpm --filter @game/web dev -- --host 0.0.0.0 --port 5173"
scripts.dev:test-stack: concurrently --raw "PORT=4000 pnpm --filter @game/server dev" "VITE_API_URL=http://localhost:4000 VITE_WS_URL=ws://localhost:4000/ws pnpm --filter @game/web dev -- --strictPort --host 0.0.0.0 --port 5173"
scripts.typecheck: pnpm --filter @game/domain exec tsc -p tsconfig.json --noEmit && pnpm --filter @game/web exec tsc -p tsconfig.json --noEmit
scripts.ci: pnpm lint && pnpm typecheck && pnpm test && pnpm --filter @game/server test:integration && pnpm test:e2e
